content.rendered:
Welcome

The ULV brand goes beyond logos and fonts; it embodies the stories we share, the impact we create, and our reputation on and off campus. It is the essence of what it means to be a Leo for Life, whether you’re a student, faculty, staff, alum, parent, or university friend. This site offers invaluable resources and guidelines for representing and promoting our university’s brand effectively. Here, you’ll find the tools to ensure consistency, uphold policies, and reinforce our visual identity across all communications. By following these guidelines, we strengthen our brand presence, enhance our reputation, and present a unified and compelling reflection of the University of La Verne’s values, mission, and achievements.

 

Wordmarks and Logos

Learn about our university wordmarks, logos, sub brands, and other resources available for branding.

Learn More
Visual Identity

Explore our university fonts, color guidelines, and other visual elements that visually communicate our brand.

Learn More
Apply the Brand

Learn how to apply the brand through print, web, photo, video, signage, merchandise, and other applications.

Connect With Us

For further assistance with our visual style and guidelines, please reference the MarComm page of our website, laverne.edu/marcomm.

Photography resources and approved brand imagery can be accessed by staff, faculty, and students by requesting an account on Image Relay at laverne.imagerelay.com.

To learn more about how the Office of Strategic Marketing and Communications can support your next project, please visit univ.lv/projectrequest.

For general media-related questions or inquiries please contact media@laverne.edu.
